languages.text: "Зачем..." {n}Клыки во рту... в пасти Ульфара будто стали больше. Искаженное лицо выглядит странно — эмоции стекли с него, будто вода, и осталось лишь хищное равнодушие.{/n}

"Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зачем..." {n}Клыки во рту... в пасти Ульфара будто стали больше. Искаженное лицо выглядит странно — эмоции стекли с него, будто вода, и осталось лишь хищное равнодушие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his maw — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? » {n}Les dents d'Ulfar, ou plutôt ses crocs, semblent avoir poussé. Son visage déformé vous interpelle : toutes ses émotions semblent avoir disparu, ne laissant derrière elles qu'une indifférence prédatrice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? » {n}Les dents d'Ulfar, ou plutôt ses crocs, semblent avoir poussé. Son visage déformé vous interpelle : toutes ses émotions semblent avoir disparu, ne laissant derrière elles qu'une indifférence prédatrice.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “为什么？”{n}乌尔法嘴里的尖牙变得更尖了，整张嘴似乎变成了凶兽的巨口。他扭曲的表情让你感觉非常古怪，仿佛他所有的情绪都消失了，只剩下冷漠的饥渴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “为什么？”{n}乌尔法嘴里的尖牙变得更尖了，整张嘴似乎变成了凶兽的巨口。他扭曲的表情让你感觉非常古怪，仿佛他所有的情绪都消失了，只剩下冷漠的饥渴。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜだ？」{n}ウルファーの口…というより、口吻の中の牙が大きくなったように見えた。彼の歪んだ表情が奇妙に感じられる。まるですべての感情が溶け出し、肉食獣のような本能だけが残ってしまったかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なぜだ？」{n}ウルファーの口…というより、口吻の中の牙が大きくなったように見えた。彼の歪んだ表情が奇妙に感じられる。まるですべての感情が溶け出し、肉食獣のような本能だけが残ってしまったかのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Warum?" {n}Ulfars Fangzähne in seinem Mund – oder vielmehr seinem Maul – scheinen noch größer zu werden. Sein Gesicht ist verzerrt, was dir seltsam vorkommt – alle Emotionen sind verschwunden, übrig bleibt nur raubtierhafte Gleichgültigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Warum?" {n}Ulfars Fangzähne in seinem Mund – oder vielmehr seinem Maul – scheinen noch größer zu werden. Sein Gesicht ist verzerrt, was dir seltsam vorkommt – alle Emotionen sind verschwunden, übrig bleibt nur raubtierhafte Gleichgültigkeit.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué?». {n}Los colmillos de Ulfar parecen haber crecido en su boca (sus fauces, más bien). Su expresión desencajada se te antoja extraña: todas sus emociones se han disipado, dejando únicamente la indiferencia propia de un depredador.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué?». {n}Los colmillos de Ulfar parecen haber crecido en su boca (sus fauces, más bien). Su expresión desencajada se te antoja extraña: todas sus emociones se han disipado, dejando únicamente la indiferencia propia de un depredador.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Neden?" {n}Ulfar'ın ağzındaki köpek dişleri daha da büyumüş gibi duruyor, kurt dişi dense yeridir. Ulfar'ın çarpık yüz ifadesi sana tuhaf geliyor: İçindeki tüm duygular erimiş gitmiş, geriye sadece yırtıcı bir lakayıtlık kalmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why?" {n}The fangs in Ulfar's mouth — or rather, his muzzle — appear to have grown larger. His distorted expression strikes you as odd: all his emotions have melted away, leaving behind nothing but predatory indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Neden?" {n}Ulfar'ın ağzındaki köpek dişleri daha da büyumüş gibi duruyor; kurt dişi dense yeridir. Ulfar'ın çarpık yüz ifadesi sana tuhaf geliyor: İçindeki tüm duygular erimiş gitmiş, geriye sadece yırtıcı bir lakayıtlık kalmış.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
